Brightness backlight adjustment

This page used for adjustubg screen brightness (i.e. backlight level) through pigpio commands

general_pages.quick_menu_page module

class general_pages.quick_menu_page.QuickMenuPage(name)

Bases: PageTemplate

A quickly accessible menu for setting brightness, taking screenshots, going to sleep, etc. Is always accessible from all pages by tapping top leff button.

general_pages.sleep_page module

class general_pages.sleep_page.SleepPage(name)

Bases: PageTemplate

A dummy page for low-power sleep mode

handle_events(screen, curr_events)

Handles basic touch/mouse events

next_frame(screen, curr_events, **kwargs)
on_enter()

Saves the backlight level before going to sleep. Backlight will be restored to this level at wake up

wake_from_sleep()

Resets backlight level, wakes MCU, flushes serial connection
